title: Top 10 trending phones of week 7
description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra extended its streak at the top of our trending chart to seven weeks, winning each installment this year. Its aging mid-range sibling Galaxy A55 rose to second this week, which wasn't the most expected development. [#InlinePriceWidget, 13322, 1#] The Xiaomi 15 Ultra stepped down to third, as the Galaxy S25 found itself just off the podium. Apple's latest iPhone SE is expected to debut tomorrow and it's already the fifth most popular phone in our database. It should be way higher come the week 8 edition. The iPhone 16 Pro retained its sixth position,...
excerpt: A phone we did not expect to make the podium that early. Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra extended its streak at the top of our trending chart to seven weeks,...

html:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra extended its streak at the top of our trending chart to seven weeks, winning each installment this year. Its aging mid-range sibling Galaxy A55 rose to second this week, which wasn't the most expected development.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
256GB 12GB RAM$ 1,249.00$ 1,299.99
512GB 12GB RAM$ 1,299.99$ 1,299.99
Show all prices

The Xiaomi 15 Ultra stepped down to third, as the Galaxy S25 found itself just off the podium.

Apple's latest iPhone SE is expected to debut tomorrow and it's already the fifth most popular phone in our database. It should be way higher come the week 8 edition.

The iPhone 16 Pro retained its sixth position, followed by the Poco X7 Pro and the Galaxy S24 Ultra - just like last week.

The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ captured ninth, while the Galaxy A16 5G rounds out the top 10 in week 7 of 2025.
